typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		symbol as string,
		series as string,
		security_name as string,
		Band as integer,
		Remarks as string,
		update_time as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> secdata
source(output(
		symbol as string,
		series as string,
		security_name as string,
		Band as integer,
		Remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> dbsecdata
secdata, dbsecdata lookup(secdata@symbol == dbsecdata@symbol
	&& secdata@series == dbsecdata@series,
	multiple: true,
	broadcast: 'both')~> secseriesmacth
macthingsecs split(matchvalue,
	disjoint: false) ~> splitsecs@(ignoreinserted, insertabsent)
secseriesmacth derive(matchvalue = isMatch()) ~> macthingsecs
splitsecs@insertabsent sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		symbol as string,
		series as string,
		security_name as string,
		Band as integer,
		Remarks as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		symbol = splitsecs@insertabsent@symbol,
		series = splitsecs@insertabsent@series,
		security_name = splitsecs@insertabsent@security_name,
		Band = splitsecs@insertabsent@Band,
		Remarks = splitsecs@insertabsent@Remarks
	)) ~> secmain
